input.sentences: this man is at the beer tasting .
he brought his wife and his kid with him .
the little girl wants to try some beer .
this little dude tried to get into the jager .
output.sentences: It started off as a mellow afternoon.
We ended up getting several drinks and a bucket of beer.
My son and wife decided to stop by on the way home.
My son was having a ball.
Perhaps he needs a girlfriend to play with.
